subject: Prices slashed on our website
body:
Our new medically proven Viagra pills can make you stand out of the crowd 
of contemptible impotent and decrepit losers! 

Just order it on our website: http://www.nuspacosmetics.com/ take one pill once a day 
and you'll see how your virility will have be increased by the end of the fortnight!
